Mariano
Otero

"I consider painting to be a long and constant labour, one that does not allow for improvisation. With the aesthetic means proper to this art, I aim to express my ideas and my emotions while eliminating what seems to me superfluous."

Mariano Otero

Spanish (born in Madrid, 1942) and living in France (Rennes) for many years, Mariano Otero is a round trip painter who periodically returns to his native land to show his work. Within his artistic production, tango is not his solitary theme yet it is an issue he recurs to and reconsiders with the creative glance of an artist. Although Mariano (still) does not really know how to dance the tango, his retina has been captivated by the plasticity of a dance that does not need to be dominated to be felt.
All the paintings were showed at the Galería Max Estrella, Madrid.
